scripts.report: allure generate allure-results --clean -o allure-report && allure open allure-report
scripts.regression: npm run clean:allure && npm run test && npm run report
scripts.webTests: npm run clean:allure && npx playwright test --grep @Web && npm run report
scripts.APITests: npm run clean:allure && npx playwright test --grep @API --reporter=line,allure-playwright && npm run report
